item.title: Color by B-factor
item.description: B-factors are measures of how much thermal motion an atom exhibited during the determination of a protein structure by X-ray crystallography. It is useful to color a protein based on the b-factors of its backbone atoms to see the segments of the protein that are most dynamic (or where the uncertainty in atom positions is the highest). The best way to color by b-factor in PyMOL is to use the color_b.
